department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Supply and Delivery of one (1) Dump Truck Unit must be delivered to Canada Maintenance Compound #1, Compound Road, Jasper, AB T0E 1E0
description: Supply and delivery of one (1) dump truck. Unit must be delivered to Canada Maintenance Compound #1, Compound Road, Jasper, AB T0E 1E0 ready for immediate use, with all specified equipment installed. Final inspection will be by the consignee at the point of delivery
